content: Performance was excellent once again across the portfolio, and we recognized revenue of $174 million, gold equivalent ounce volume of 97,400 and operating cash flow of $130 million, all of which are quarterly records for the company. Excluding the onetime gain on the sale of our interest in the Manh Choh project and other discrete tax items in the prior year, our prior period adjusted earnings were $53.8 million compared to adjusted earnings of $70 million in the current year or a 30% increase.
